sentences.sContent: If you know your cat well you will be able to tell the difference in his demeanor.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you know your cat well you will be able to tell the difference in his demeanor.
sentences.sCn: 如果你足够了解你的猫咪，那你应该能够分辨它行为上的不同。

sentences.sContent: She is acutely aware of the discrepancy between her inner state and her public demeanor.
sentences.sContent_eng: She is acutely aware of the discrepancy between her inner state and her public demeanor.
sentences.sCn: 她很敏锐地意识到自己内心状态和公众行为之间的不同。

sentences.sContent: Your walk and posture and general physical demeanor before you talk to any potential one night stands is just as important, if not moreso.
sentences.sContent_eng: Your walk and posture and general physical demeanor before you talk to any potential one night stands is just as important, if not moreso.
sentences.sCn: 在你寻找任何潜在的一夜情之前，你走路的姿势和行为举止都非常重要，不然的话就需要更多的信心。
